subject: Re: [junit] Testing web services or web applications
msgSnippet: ... Perhaps you do, but I posit that no tool will do an adequate job of shielding me from the pain of relying in system-level testing when I really want
messageBody:
Chris Morris wrote:
> J. B. Rainsberger wrote:
>
> >You can test the entire application through the web user interface, but
> >that's never been a good idea and it likely never will be.
> >
> >
> We might have something say about that ;-)

Perhaps you do, but I posit that no tool will do an adequate job of
shielding me from the pain of relying in system-level testing when I
really want object-level testing.
--
J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com
Author, JUnit Recipes: Practical Methods for Programmer Testing
